answers.answer: Hi there!Well, without a detailed clinical evaluation it would be difficult to determine the cause of your symptoms. Possibilities that may need to be considered include GU infections/ inflammations, enlarged prostate, neuro-muscular issues, medications, alcohol, smoking, drugs/medications, hormonal imbalance, radiation therapy, renal causes, metabolic disorders, hypertension, diabetes, prostatitis, urethritis, psychological issues etc. just to name a few. At a primary level, I would suggest being a bit relaxed and working on the psychological factors such as stress. It might also be beneficial to get rid of factors like smoking/ alcohol/ drugs, if involved. In case this doesn’t work; I would suggest seeing your primary care physician or a urologist for an evaluation of the above mentioned causes and appropriate specific treatment.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: I am 23 years old. I had left varicocele surgery in Feb 2010. The surgery was successful, but i have faced UTI several times from after my surgery  during the last two years. Currently i am facing the following problems:1. My bladder does not gets empty fully.2. The speed of urination is sometimes fast, sometimes slow and very slow in some cases.3. My penis is not working properly.4. My erections are not hard and does not last long.6. I am not getting erections with my thoughts, i get erections only while watching porn's.7. The sperm count is very low.8. The ejaculation process is also very power, the sperm does not fully comes out of penis, some sperms lefts inside and i can feel it.9. After masturbation i feel urge to urinate several times with very slow speed of urination.What is the reasons for the above problems. For UTI i have used antibiotics like cefixime 400mg, Gemifloxacin 320mg, Enoxacin sesquihydrate 400 mg several times over the past two years. Is there any nerve problems or sensitivity issue i am not getting proper urination and sex.
title: Urination and Sex Problem
